content: Update. I am no longer using Filesystem.open with O_APPEND because using O_APPEND is very broken on linux, see the end of https://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man2/pwrite.2.html . I am instead using https://docs.julialang.org/en/v1/stdlib/FileWatching/#Pidfile
Nathan Zimmerberg has marked this topic as resolved.
